name: Potato vs. Post-Its
description:
Potato vs. Post-Its is a simple shooter game that’s a metaphor for all the tasks occupying our desks/mind and the luxury of not doing anything for a while.

Kill all post-its before time runs out (if you can!) – time is unpredictable here as it is in real life.

Controls: Left/right arrow keys to move, space to jump.

This is my assignment game with the theme 'unstable' for Introduction to Programming for Games at Goldsmiths, University of London. Unfortunately, the rendering turned turquoise during the WebGL process.

Font

Permanent Marker by Google Fonts

Music

Cruising for Goblins by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
